description: You can install custom skins by placing them into the \​Skins\​ directory of the osu! game installation (typically C:\​Program Files\​osu!\​Skins\​ , but you may have to create the directory manually). If you downloaded an archive (e.g., a .RAR or .ZIP file), you will need to first decompress the enclosed folder and then place the folder in the \​Skins\​ directory.
